segments.text: What ’ s your favourite ball sport ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like basketball . I really enjoy watching the NBA games on TV .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t really have one but I support Huston .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do they have a good team ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think they do , but I ’ m biased . They have a good manager and a great coach .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can ’ t keep up with the game . The players play so quickly that I can hardly see what they are doing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have the same problem . The players are really very skilful . I wish I could play that well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You play for an amateur team , don ’ t you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I do . We ’ re doing pretty well this season . We ’ Ve won most of our games , but we ’ re not top of the league table .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many more games are there this season ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We ’ Ve got four more games . I hope we can win all of them .
segments.speaker: S2
